data.message: People think this.mm they're gonna make one passionate song or speech and that's gonna be it.everythings gonna click and boom world peace... not it is forever identifying and finding democratic solutions to problems forever..  and it takes time it takes teaching people... and it takes time to make a conversion... you gotta meet people where they are and work with people so diverse than you that you literally hate them and wish they would die and you gotta do it with a smile sometimes...
